name: Framed (itch)
description:
Enter the frame and paint your way through shades of doubt.
Generate your own masterpiece!

Framed is an FPP - First Person Painter game focusing on a paintable environment.
Defeat your shades of doubt by painting over them. Each shade has a different behavior and is weak and strong to different colors.

Controls
WASD - movement
Hold right mouse button - pick color
Hold left mouse button - aim a swing

The game is made in Unity using PlayMaker as one of the main tools.
Sound and music was not created and are used from free depositories.

Creators: Abdulaziz Aldigs, Jirka Maršík, Jan Vaněček

Source code: https://github.com/jirkamarsik/Framed
